item.description:
A few people are planning to meet at the Sky Lounge in Nashua and have offered to have others join in. Here are the details:

The hostess said she will save an area for us if there are enough people. The directions are exit 8 in Nashua, in the Golds Gym plaza at 522 Amherst St, Nashua NH. The band playing is "Last Laugh" who start at 9pm and "Yes" the Celtics game will be on the really, really big theatre size TV screen. No seats saved after 9pm. Look for Suzie and Karen who will be there at 8. Please respond yeses only so they know how many to plan for.
http://www.skyloungen...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Last minute get together
